trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of key container access allowed.
trans-unit.target: 指定允许的密钥容器访问类型。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by members of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举的成员使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry>类。

trans-unit.source: Many of these flags can have powerful effects and should be granted only to highly trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 许多这些标志可以功能强大的效果，并且应仅授予高度受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: The most powerful of the flags are Create, Delete, Import, Export, Sign, Decrypt, and AllFlags.
trans-unit.target: 最强大的标志是创建、 删除、 导入、 导出、 登录、 解密和 AllFlags。

trans-unit.source: For specific threats that the use of these flags can present, see the member descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些标志可以显示的特定威胁，请参阅成员的说明。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Create> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Create>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Create, decrypt, delete, and open a key container; export and import a key; sign files using a key; and view and change the access control list for a key container.
trans-unit.target: 创建、解密、删除、打开密钥容器；导出、导入密钥；使用密钥给文件签名；查看并更改密钥容器的访问控制列表。

trans-unit.source: Change the access control list (ACL) for a key container.
trans-unit.target: 更改密钥容器的访问控制列表 (ACL)。

trans-unit.source: Create a key container.
trans-unit.target: 创建密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Creating a key container also creates a file on disk.
trans-unit.target: 创建的密钥容器还创建磁盘上的文件。

trans-unit.source: It is very important that any key container that is created is removed when it is no longer in use.
trans-unit.target: 它是非常重要中, 不再使用时删除任何创建的密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Decrypt a key container.
trans-unit.target: 解密密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Decryption is a privileged operation because it uses the private key.
trans-unit.target: 解密是一项特权的操作，因为它使用私钥。

trans-unit.source: Delete a key container.
trans-unit.target: 删除密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Deleting a key container can constitute a denial of service attack because it prevents the use of files encrypted or signed with the key.
trans-unit.target: 删除密钥容器可能构成拒绝服务攻击，因为它可以防止使用加密，或使用的密钥签名的文件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, deletion is a privileged operation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，删除是一项特权的操作。

trans-unit.source: Export a key from a key container.
trans-unit.target: 从密钥容器导出密钥。

trans-unit.source: The ability to export a key is potentially harmful because it removes the exclusivity of the key.
trans-unit.target: 导出密钥的功能是可能有害的因为它会删除的键的唯一性。

trans-unit.source: Import a key into a key container.
trans-unit.target: 将密钥导入密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: The ability to import a key can be as harmful as the ability to delete a container because importing a key into a named key container replaces the existing key.
trans-unit.target: 将密钥导入的能力可以同样有害能够删除容器，因为将密钥导入的命名的密钥容器会替换现有密钥。

trans-unit.source: No access to a key container.
trans-unit.target: 不能访问密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: Open a key container and use the public key.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个密钥容器并使用公钥。

trans-unit.source: `Open` does not give permission to sign or decrypt files using the private key, but it does allow a user to verify file signatures and to encrypt files.
trans-unit.target: `Open` 未授予权限进行签名或解密没有文件使用的私钥，但它允许用户来验证文件签名并加密文件。

trans-unit.source: Only the owner of the key is able to decrypt these files using the private key.
trans-unit.target: 只有密钥的所有者是能够解密这些文件使用的私钥。

trans-unit.source: Sign a file using a key.
trans-unit.target: 使用密钥给文件签名。

trans-unit.source: The ability to sign a file is potentially harmful because it can allow a user to sign a file using another user's key.
trans-unit.target: 对文件进行签名的能力是可能有害的因为它可让用户使用其他用户的密钥文件进行签名。

trans-unit.source: View the access control list (ACL) for a key container.
trans-unit.target: 查看密钥容器的访问控制列表 (ACL)。
